website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, well-made set of decorations in a beautiful mint color scheme.
pros: Kit includes baby shower banner, garland, paper fans, and tassels
Assorted paper fans are easy to assemble
All pieces feel durable and built to last
Mint and grey color scheme, perfect for elephant-themed baby shower
cons: Putting the tassels together is quite time-consuming, about 30 minutes

customer_reviews.title: Worked out OK
customer_reviews.text: When we went to put this up it ended up having more to assemble than we thought. It looked fine in the end but was time consuming then at the end of the shower, we ended up throwing everything away. So it worked for what we needed but was kind of a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hill

customer_reviews.title: Cute decorations
customer_reviews.text: Nice decorations for a baby shower. The colors were nice and classy. Exactly what I was looking for and hoping for. The only thing I did not like was having to put together all the Pom poms as it took me a few minutes extra to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The colors were perfect and accurate as in the picture. Everything was easy to assemble minus the fringe. The fringe took forever and I ended up not being able to use it as I ran out of time.
customer_reviews.author: Keylasix6

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to assemble... But worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit of assembly required...plan on about 20minutes. But perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby shower decorations
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cute decoration for a baby shower I hosted. Great for neutral when the gender is not known!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, vibrant colors, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, looking forward to using it in the shower next month. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great decorations, quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product and perfect for our office party. The signage is made out of cardboard so it can definitely be used again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Cherijojo

customer_reviews.title: baby showerrr
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my baby shower and were high quality
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as pictured after you put it together. It took me about 20 minutes to get the fringe ribbon together but other than that, all of this added a super cute addition to our baby shower for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, perfect decor
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were absolutely perfect for a baby shower! The mom to be loved the colors and they were quite classy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: The decorations looked beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for baby shower decorations. It looked great! Assembly instruction were a little too vague but tassels were easy to put together once you got the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Terry G, Louisville, KY

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and a good value. Wish the color was a softer mint more like the garland but still very nice
customer_reviews.author: Elena P.

customer_reviews.title: Gender Neutral Decorations
customer_reviews.text: Pinwheels were easy to assemble; colors were true to the picture; great for the gender neutral shower we hosted!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea a suvlu

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as expected. Tassels were a little difficult but everything else was lovely. Made for great decorations !
customer_reviews.author: Sakeisha Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color assortment for this product. The price was spot on for me.
customer_reviews.author: j drews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I used this and the product was really good. Even the quality was.
customer_reviews.author: Jagadish

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product.
customer_reviews.text: Decorations where very nice. Just wish it had more, and each pom pom was nit counted as 1 seperatley.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy candia

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Colors are great and everything was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price, kind of difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Loved this but there are no written directions. There are step by step pictures which were hard to follow for the tassels. I tried to put it together, had a co-worker and her husband try, we couldn’t figure it out. Maybe you will do better than we did :) Everything else were relatively easy to assemble and professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were exactly as pictured and much better quality than I expected for the price. The tassle garland requires assembly, but it isn't difficult, just give yourself a good half an hour. We received many compliments from guests on these decorations, and they are durable enough to be stowed away for future use!
customer_reviews.author: rlusk

customer_reviews.title: Good decorations
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for an office baby shower. Everyone loved it. The only thing I didnt like was making the tassels. Those were annoying to roll.
customer_reviews.author: snickers.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! They look great, are easy to assemble and hang, and clean up is a breeze. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: epsk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower decoration!
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors. Its a perfect addition to any baby showef!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t include all of the pieces as advertised and the pieces that were included in place of those advertised are essentially impossible to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Conlon

product_meta.title: Mint Grey Baby Shower Decorations, Mint Grey White Elephant Baby Shower Supplies, Mint Bridal Shower Decorations, Mint Grey Birthday Party Decor
feature_bullets: Multi-functional: Our Grey Mint Elephant baby shower decorations/ Baby Girl / boy Baby Shower Decorations Mint Grey White Paper Fan Party Kit Package is made not only to be use at the party only but can also be use to decorate nursery, living room etc. Mint White Grey Baby Shower Decoration is just the extra decor you need at your baby shower! Tie these decorations up to an announcement sign, outside of your shower or even on party tables.

Package: 1pc mint “Baby Shower” Banner, 1pc Mint Grey and White circle paper garland, 9pc 10" 12" 16" Fiesta Mint Grey and White hanging paper fans with white grey and mint color. 12 pcs paper tassels in grey white and mint. High Quality: Our Meant2ToBe Baby shower is made from high quality materials that make it long lasting. Perfect for neutral Baby Shower Decoration.

This long mint, grey and white garland is made from quality craft paper. It can be use to decorate your wedding, baby shower, Birthday, Festival party. Ideal to use as backdrop or banners, light up your party or for daily life decoration for room

10" 12" 16" Fiesta Mint Grey and White Hanging Paper Fan Flower for Girls or boys Baby Shower Party Decoration - 9 PCS hanging paper fans in the package, Made by tissue paper, Easy to hang up or put away, Use it for Baby Shower, Wedding Party, Girls or Boys Birthday party Decoration

100% Satisfaction Customer Guaranteed: Our unique Meant2ToBe Mint White Grey Baby Shower Party Decoration has full trust in quality, that is why our products comes with 100% satisfaction guarantee. We have absolute confidence in our brand. In fact, some of us used it ourselves. If for any reason you are not satisfied with the purchase, kindly contact us and we will offer you a FULL REFUND no questions asked. “Add to Cart” now while supply last and put an end to your worries!
